name: Casanchef
description: A bot for Casancrem (the cream cheese company) that suggests recipes and ideas to cook based on requirements or pictures of whatever a user has in their fridge, through WhatsApp.

name: La IA del Brunch
description: A bot available through a webpage that recommended places to go out and eat using the Google Places API.

name: NoticIAs dIArIAs
description: A Telegram bot service that sends daily messages with AI news taken from YouTube videos, newsletters, and so on from the last 24 hours.

name: Personal Assistant
description: A private service that can read and write on your Google Calendar, read and write on your Gmail, control your Spotify (play music, create playlists, etc), and transcribe audios, all through a simple Telegram bot with a complex multi-agent architecture behind it, running on MAWS.
